phrases: Choose some kind of bread and a drink for tomorrow's breakfast.
Umm... for a cold, we have got water, sports drinks...
What is some food that would be easily digested?
Rin, do you want to get something for tomorrow's breakfast, too?
Did I give it to her?
Bacteria from a cold is all over the place.
Some people will catch it, some will not.
But you do not have to worry about who is the one that passed it on.
Can I pick something to bring her too?
What are you doing in the snacks aisle?!
I do not know about tomorrow.
It is different than a sacrifice.
I do not think it is like some penalty game.
I do not get it at all.
I am a little bit unsatisfied, but your presence
right now is more than just important.
There is no such thing in this world
Crying is not painful, it is love's sweet drops, sweet drops!
I want to keep dreaming forever, ya know?
I want to be more kind, ya know?
As long as I Am with you, I Am happy.
Girls sure are strong, ya know?
But sometimes we are weak, ya know?
Our wish is to be happy, happy, happy!
And those days will be happy, too!
Just want to make you happy!
Yeah, we are going to go home.
I do not want your mom fussing over us.
There is food in there, so give it to your mom.
Listen when somebody is talking to you!
Kouki, you do not have to...
I am sorry you are always having to look after him...
O-Oh, no, I owe you for taking care of Rin...
She is a lot better now.
She went back to school today.
I am glad you are feeling better, Rin-chan.
I am making that rice gruel right now.
I will be better soon, too.
Rin, let us go throw my tooth!
Nitani-san, you may have caught your cold from Rin, taking care of her...
We are going to throw it from here!
I meet a lot of people every day.
I go to the office by train, which is always packed.
I am going to throw it on that roof.
There is no way to know who I caught it from.
So do not worry about it.
Well, at least let me help with Kouki.
Even if it is just picking him up from daycare...
Daikichi, let us play video games!
Kouki, make sure to help your mom out.
The pudding and little drink are from Rin.
I told you I am going to practice for the jump rope contest!
Please do not overdo it too soon.
I am sorry to always be taking advantage of your generosity.
I think it is the other way around.
For some reason, he just cannot get that.
Kouki, you are jumping too soon.
When the jump rope swings around, you jump here, right?
Then you cannot move your arms and legs at the same time.
Your arms go first, then your legs.
Rin, your problem is you swing your arms in too big circles.
Keep your arms in close like this...
Too much energy this early in the morning...
It is'because he is got a big brother.
He will imitate everything the older one does.
Are not you going to do it, Sayaka-chan?
This time, she lost one of her upper teeth...
Girls have it rough, even when they are little kids...
Sayaka-chan, what kind of container are you using to hold your teeth?
Did your parents buy you a cute one?
You do not know about the case people use
to hold their kids' baby teeth as a keepsake?
They have these cute tiny ones.
I bought one for Kouki, but...
I bet Rin would love that!
We are saving the kids' teeth, too.
I had no idea they had those things!
It is been like this ever since I met Rin.
Fretting and getting nervous over the littlest things...
The meat and potato stew Daikichi makes is really delicious.
Also, Daikichi can run very fast.
I had to write about someone at home.
You put your baby teeth in there when they come out.
It is okay, it is okay...
Until now, I have thrown all my teeth onto the roof.
That is fine, that is fine.
Throwing'them or keeping'them, either way works.
I am going to do my best with this jump rope thing, too!
There you go, touching your tooth again...
It will come out on its own.
Any way you slice it, she is going to look like she got clocked.
As long as she does not smile...
I am starting to get a spare tire...
It is tough when you get to be our age.
Somehow, I want to stop it in its tracks.
It is easier on the knees this way.
Teach me how to do that, too!
Only you get to look cool?!
First, learn how to jump rope the normal way!
Rin-chan, you are so good at doing it backwards!
They have energy to burn, do not they?
I do not know where they get it from...
I think you two already know this, but I am not Rin's dad.
We have only been living together for about a year now.
Until then, I used all my time for myself,
but once I started living with Rin, my lifestyle suddenly changed...
You guys, though, you have been with your kids ever since they were born...
For me, it is still early days, so it is nothing, really,
but I have been wondering whether you are okay with not having any
so-called time for yourself all the way down the line...
Rin, come to think of it, was not today the jump rope contest?
How many times around did you get?
I am going to guess you got first place for that?
But I know I could have done better with regular style jumping rope...
Well, they only gave you one chance...
Anyway, it is true that you learned to jump rope a lot.
They will want to see those wobbly front teeth.
How many times do I have to tell you?
Do not touch them if you can help it!
And I will show them how I can jump rope, too!
I bet my mom and dad will be surprised
to see how you have shot up since the last time.
I wonder if I am taller than Auntie now.
I do not think you are that tall yet.
I will have to tell Grandpa, too.
I have been waiting for you!
Look at how big you have gotten!
Are you one of the taller kids in your class?
If you would called, I would have picked you up at the station!
Soon, you will be taller than me!
Yeah, I just got here a little while ago.
You used to wear them, right?
Two of them in front are wobbly...
Sometimes it hurts, but I am used to it.
Is not there anything you can do for her?!
And come to think of it, when I was a kid,
you talked about pulling my loose teeth out with a thread!
I tried to make everything soft.
Want To have some freeze-dried tofu?
I will have boiled beans too, Auntie!
This might just be the real Rin...
She said he seemed like a nice guy.
The only thing I am not on board with is he wants to have a kid right away.
That is a good thing, is not it?
I would not be able to go out drinking or go to concerts
or go on trips or eat delicious food...
I would not be able to do anything anymore!
Well, you got to talk to your husband about that.
I am not into kids in the first place!
And I do not want to become one of those pushy moms either!
I am not confident that I could sacrifice myself to raise a kid...
Ah, I think you would manage somehow.
If you put your mind to it...
Sometimes you just have to manage...
Easy for you to say, big brother...
I have never become a father or husband, let alone a mother.
True, I do not have time to shop at my leisure,
or chat with friends over coffee...
But my time at work is my own time...
And my time with my son is also my time...
Other parents might look like it,
but I do not think they are doing anything special.
If you look around you, you will see mothers and fathers galore like that.
Some of my adult teeth are coming in.
I bet I will still keep getting nervous and worked up
over minor stuff from here on out.
I suppose it is the same way with those two...
It is like you have got a cat's face!
Send a text to your parents' house!
Even so, it seems like that smile will be my happiness from now on...
And I guess I do not think there is anything wrong with that.
It is the same road I am used to traveling
But I can see it sparkling so bright
With the sun shining down its warmth
And you here by my side...
I am already high, high, high
I am already high, high, high
